Package gameobjects

Class Item

java.lang.Object
gameobjects.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
An Item is the class used to store everything in the Heros inventory. It uses different variables such as the String imagePath, that's what image is going to be used to represent the Item. And the Vector2 size, that is how big the Item will appear.

There's also the String name that refers to the item's name. And the integer quantity, to know how much of that item is stored.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item​(java.lang.String imagePath, int quantity, java.lang.String name, Vector2 size, boolean passiveItem)
      Constructs a new Item, whose size is specified by the Vector2 argument.
      Parameters:
      imagePath - the image of the new Item
      quantity - the quantity stacked in this new Item
      name - the name of the new Item
      size - the size of the new Item
      passiveItem - whether the new Item in consumable or passive

      Returns:
      true if their the same, false if not.
